item.name: Alarm Notification For : chkpntTempertureTrap
item.description: Temperture sensor alert (Sensor name provided in trap)

item.name: Alarm Notification For : chkpntFanSpeedTrap
item.description: Fan speed sensor alert (Sensor name provided in trap)

item.name: Alarm Notification For : chkpntVoltageTrap
item.description: Voltage sensor alert (Sensor name provided in trap)

item.name: Alarm Notification For : chkpntPowerSupplyTrap
item.description: Power supply sensor alert (Sensor name provided in trap)

item.name: Alarm Notification For : chkpntSystemConfigurationChangeTrap
item.description: System configuration was changed

item.name: Alarm Notification For : chkpntSystemConfigurationSaveTrap
item.description: System configuration was saved

item.name: Alarm Notification For : chkpntRAIDVolumeStateTrap
item.description: The RAID volume state is not optimal. Volume state, volume flags, disk state and disk flags are included.

item.name: Alarm Notification For : chkpntDiskSpaceTrap
item.description: Monitored disk partiton is dangerously full alert, alerts when multiDiskFreeAvailablePercent <=X (filesystem name in trap)

item.name: Alarm Notification For : chkpntRAIDVolumeTrap
item.description: Monitored RAID volume state, alerts when raidVolumeState =2(volume ID in trap)

item.name: Alarm Notification For : chkpntRAIDDiskTrap
item.description: Monitored RAID disk state alert, alerts when raidDiskState is one of [DEGRADED (1), FAILED(2) or UNKNOWN(255)](disk ID and volume ID in trap)

item.name: Alarm Notification For : chkpntRAIDDiskFlagsTrap
item.description: Monitored RAID disk flag alert, alerts when raidDiskFalgs contains the OUT_OF_SYNC(0x01) or QUIESCED(0x02) flags (disk ID and volume ID in trap)

item.name: Alarm Notification For : chkpntTrapNetIfState
item.description: Interface admin status alert, alerts when svnNetIfState =0(Interface name provided in trap)

item.name: Alarm Notification For : chkpntTrapNetIfUnplugged
item.description: Interface unplugged alert, alerts when an interface disappear from svnNetIfTable(Interface name provided in trap)

item.name: Alarm Notification For : chkpntTrapNewConnRate
item.description: New connection rate alert, alerts when the new connection rate equals\exceeds X (New Connections/Sec)

item.name: Alarm Notification For : chkpntTrapConcurrentConnRate
item.description: Concurrent connections rate alert, alerts when fwNumConn >=X (Connections/Sec)

item.name: Alarm Notification For : chkpntTrapBytesThroughput
item.description: Bytes throughput alert, alerts when the throughput equals\exceeds X (Bytes/Sec)

item.name: Alarm Notification For : chkpntTrapAcceptedPacketRate
item.description: Accepted packet rate alert, alerts when the accepted packet rate equals\exceeds X (Packets/Sec)

item.name: Alarm Notification For : chkpntTrapNetIfOperState
item.description: Interface operational link status alert, alerts when svnNetIfOperState =0(Interface name provided in trap)

item.name: Alarm Notification For : chkpntTrapNetIfRXDrop
item.description: Interface RX drops changed alert, alerts when svnNetIfRXDrop changed

item.name: Alarm Notification For : chkpntCPUCoreUtilTrap
item.description: Core utilization alert, alerts when multiProcUsage >=X (core name in trap)

item.name: Alarm Notification For : chkpntCPUCoreInterruptsTrap
item.description: Core interrupts alert, alerts when multiProcInterrupts >=X (core name in trap)

item.name: Alarm Notification For : chkpntSwapMemoryTrap
item.description: Swap memory utilization alert, alerts when memActiveVirtual64 exceeds X% of memTotalVirtual64

item.name: Alarm Notification For : chkpntRealMemoryTrap
item.description: Real memory utilization alert, alerts when memActiveReal64 exceeds X% of memTotalReal64

item.name: Alarm Notification For : chkpntClusterMemberStateTrap
item.description: Cluster member state changed alert, alerts when haState changed (Cluster member identifier provided in trap)

item.name: Alarm Notification For : chkpntClusterBlockStateTrap
item.description: Cluster block state alert, alert when haBlockState is not equal to OK (Cluster member identifier provided in trap)

item.name: Alarm Notification For : chkpntClusterStateTrap
item.description: Cluster state alert, alert when haStatCode is not equal to 0 (Cluster member identifier provided in trap)

item.name: Alarm Notification For : chkpntClusterProblemStateTrap
item.description: Cluster problem status alert, alert when haProblemStatus is not equal to OK

item.name: Alarm Notification For : chkpntClusterInterfaceStateTrap
item.description: Cluster interface status alert, alerts when haStatus is not equal to Up (Interface name provided in trap)

item.name: Alarm Notification For : chkpntTrapLSConnState
item.description: Problem with connection to log server(Log server name provided in trap)

item.name: Alarm Notification For : chkpntTrapOverallLSConnState
item.description: Problem with connection to one or more log servers

item.name: Alarm Notification For : chkpntTrapLocalLoggingState
item.description: Problem with one or more log servers resulted with local logging

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP Traps CHECKPOINT Nodes:snmptrap["(\benterprises.2620.1.3000.5.1.1$\b)"].str("enterprises.2620.1.3000.5.1.1")}=1 & {Template SNMP Traps CHECKPOINT Nodes:snmptrap["(\benterprises.2620.1.3000.5.1.1$\b)"].nodata(3d)}=0
trigger.name: Temperture sensor alert (Sensor name provided in trap)
trigger.description: Temperture sensor alert (Sensor name provided in trap)

trigger.description: Cluster block state alert, alert when haBlockState is not equal to OK (Cluster member identifier provided in trap)

trigger.description: Cluster interface status alert, alerts when haStatus is not equal to Up (Interface name provided in trap)

trigger.description: Problem with connection to log server(Log server name provided in trap)
